saveLavaanPlot2 0.3.0
  • Reference

    Save Lavaan Plot 2

    saveLavaanPlot2.Rd

    Make and save plots with lavaanPlot::lavaanPlot

    saveLavaanPlot2(
  fit,
  filePath,
  coefs = TRUE,
  stand = TRUE,
  sig = 0.05,
  stars = "regress",
  width = 1000
)

    Arguments

    fit

    A fitted lavaan::lavaan SEM model object (e.g., created using cfa() or sem()).

    filePath

    A character string with the path to save the plot, including the file name and extension (e.g., "path/to/file.png").

    coefs

    Logical. Whether to display path coefficients. Default is TRUE.

    stand

    Logical. Whether to use standardized coefficients. Default is TRUE.

    sig

    Numeric. The significance level to display. Default is 0.05.

    stars

    Character. If "regress", significant coefficients are marked with stars. Default is "regress".

    width

    Numeric. Width of the plot in pixels. Default is 1000.

    Value

    A saved plot of the SEM model as a PNG file.

    Details

    Saves a Structural Equation Model (SEM) plot generated by lavaanPlot::lavaanPlot. The function handles intermediate steps, including exporting the plot to SVG and converting to PNG.

    See also

    lavaanPlot, lavaan

    Author

    Jasmijn Bazen j.l.bazen@students.uu.nl

    Examples

    if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
Save_LavaanPlot2(fit = SEMModel1,
                filePath = "path/to/your/SEMModel.png",
                coefs = TRUE,
                stand = TRUE,
                sig = 0.05,
                stars = "regress",
                width = 1000)
} # }
